name: Infiltration
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your shadow extends out to target creature's shadow and touches it, attempting to place a part of itself into their shadow. They must succeed on a Willpower saving throw, or the transfer is complete. You gain knowledge of the creature's location relative to yours as well as a precise knowledge of every action the creature does and every word the creature speaks.

Even on a successful saving throw, the creature does not know you targeted it with this spell unless they have the Shadow tag.
